charges.charge_description: 18:371.F CONSPIRACY TO DEFRAUD THE UNITED STATES (conspired to conceal, harbor and shield aliens)(1)

charges.charge_disposition: IMPRISONMENT: 24 months. This term consists of 24 months on each of Counts One, Two and Three, all such terms to run concurrently; SUPERVISED RELEASE: 2 years. This term consists of 2 years on each of Counts One, Two and Three, all such terms to run concurrently. Supervised Release shall be unsupervised if the Defendant leaves the U.S. and does not re-enter; The mandatory drug testing requirements are waived; Special Conditions of Supervised Release: Defendant shall cooperate in the collection of DNA, shall be prohibited from incurring new credit charges, etc.; Forfeiture pursuant to the Information and Plea Agreement; Special Assessment: $300.00 due immediately

charges.charge_description: 18:1546.F FRAUD AND MISUSE OF VISAS/PERMITS (made false statements under oath regarding documents required by immigration laws)(2)

charges.charge_disposition: IMPRISONMENT: 24 months. This term consists of 24 months on each of Counts One, Two and Three, all such terms to run concurrently; SUPERVISED RELEASE: 2 years.
